about_the_game:
Cube Jumper VR

Step into the immersive, cube-filled world of Cube Jumper VR, where one wrong step could send you plunging into lethal lava! Designed for VR, this fast-paced platformer challenges your reflexes and agility as you jump, collect diamonds, and survive increasingly difficult levels—all in a stunning, 3D virtual reality environment.

Gameplay:

In Cube Jumper VR, dive into an action-packed adventure where your goal is to collect every diamond scattered across a variety of engaging levels. As you leap through the cube-filled environment, you’ll face numerous obstacles, including traps and enemies designed to challenge your progress.

In Shooter mode, the stakes are even higher: in addition to gathering all diamonds, you must shoot down all targets to complete each level. The game tests your reflexes and strategic thinking as you navigate increasingly difficult and time-consuming levels.

Creativity is essential—some diamonds are located in hard-to-reach spots, requiring inventive solutions and clever maneuvers to access them. Collecting diamonds and shooting targets not only helps you progress to the next level but also earns you valuable points and unlocks achievements. These points contribute to your ranking on the global leaderboard, adding a competitive edge to your gameplay, while achievements showcase your skills and milestones.

Game Modes:

• Free Play: Explore the cube world at your own pace, collect diamonds, and master your jumping skills.

• Time Attack: Race against the clock for the fastest time while navigating tricky levels and avoiding dangerous falls.

• Shooter: Grab your weapon and take on hostile NPCs like spiders and drones. Shoot down targets while keeping yourself above the lava in this action-packed mode.

Key Features:

• Immersive VR Gameplay: Experience platforming like never before in full 3D, where every jump and fall feels real.

• Pickups and Power-ups: Collect diamonds and resources to enhance your abilities and score higher.

• Three Game Modes: Free Play for exploration, Time Attack for speedrunners, and Shooter for those who love action-packed combat.

• Intense Combat: In Shooter mode, defend yourself against a variety of enemies, avoid traps, and shoot at targets to complete levels.

Platforms and Requirements:

Available on PC VR systems.

Note: An Oculus VR headset (or Other OpenXR-Compatible Device) is required to play this game. Ensure that your headset is properly set up and that your PC meets or exceeds these requirements for the best experience.

Call to Action:

Get ready to jump into action—literally! Add Cube Jumper VR to your wishlist and prepare for an intense, cube-filled adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Tracked motion controllers required
  • Additional Notes: VR Only
